features.name: App Bootstrap
features.description: Vite + React entry, global styles, and app mount.

features.name: Routing & Layout
features.description: Top-level layout, navigation, and shell components (sidebar, bottom nav).

features.name: Authentication Context
features.description: App-wide auth state and route protection.

features.name: Location Context & Geolocation
features.description: User location state, selectors, and near-me filters.

features.name: Listings & Properties
features.description: Listing cards, galleries, pricing markers, and promoted listings.

features.name: Search & Filters
features.description: Enhanced search UX with autocomplete and advanced filters.

features.name: Reviews
features.description: User reviews, forms, and dialogs for writing reviews.

features.name: Lead Capture & Campaigns
features.description: Lead dialogs and campaign creation, analytics, and CRM hooks.

features.name: Favorites & Notifications
features.description: Favoriting and notification state management hooks.

features.name: Messaging
features.description: Real-time or in-app messaging hooks.

features.name: Admin Features
features.description: Admin checks and dashboards for users, properties, reports, and stats.

features.name: Nearby & Map Clustering
features.description: Hooks for nearby properties and map cluster management.

features.name: Images & Uploads
features.description: Optimized images, upload with compression, and preloading.

features.name: UI Library
features.description: Shared UI components based on Radix + Tailwind.

features.name: SEO & Schema
features.description: Structured data and crawler configuration.

features.name: PWA & Manifest
features.description: Web app manifest and base HTML shell.

features.name: Supabase Integration
features.description: Supabase setup and migrations; client usage across hooks/services.

features.name: Data Sources
features.description: Static data and location datasets.

features.name: Utilities, Types & Schemas
features.description: Shared utils, type definitions, and Zod schemas.

features.name: Branding & Assets
features.description: Logos, app icons, and icon generation script.

features.name: Reporting & Safety
features.description: Report user dialog and related flows.

features.name: Mobile (Capacitor)
features.description: Capacitor configuration and native platform projects.

features.name: Build & Tooling
features.description: Vite, Tailwind, ESLint, TypeScript, and PostCSS configuration.

features.name: Public Docs & Guides
features.description: Static public HTML guides and debug pages.
